Package tr.edu.ku.devnull.needforspear.Viewmodel.GameLogicHandlers

Class MovementHandler

java.lang.Object
tr.edu.ku.devnull.needforspear.Viewmodel.GameLogicHandlers.MovementHandler
public class MovementHandler
extends java.lang.Object
This class does the location calculations for movements of sphere, obstacles and NoblePhantasm.
Author:
Melis Oktayoğlu, Gökçe Sevimli

    • moveSpellDownward

      public Location moveSpellDownward​(Spell spell)
      Drops a spell box downwards, checks if it and the noble phantasm collides and updates player's spell values accordingly.
      Parameters:
      spell - Spell box to be dropped.
      Returns:
      Spell box location dropped downwards by 1 bit.

    • checkIfOrbitCollides

      public boolean checkIfOrbitCollides​(java.awt.Rectangle orbit)
      If collision occurs with explosive orbit, returns true, else returns false.
      Parameters:
      orbit - Orbit of the obstacle.
      Returns:
      Boolean indicates that if there is a collision

    • removingObstacles

    • checkForCollisions

      public void checkForCollisions​(java.util.List<Obstacle> listofObstacles)
      To appropriately animate sphere checks for collisions with different game objects
      Parameters:
      listofObstacles - List of obstacles to be checked through.

    • movementOfNoblePhantasm

      public double movementOfNoblePhantasm()
      This method moves the NoblePhantasm by multiplying time passed with a proper speed, which is L/seconds, according to its direction and the location is updated accordingly. If the NoblePhantasm is speeding, it goes with a 2L/seconds.
      Returns:
      double x location of NoblePhantasm.

    • rotationOfNoblePhantasm

      public void rotationOfNoblePhantasm()
      NoblePhantasm rotation is handled here.
